original: @30b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @30b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
analyzed: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
translated: A practitioner who is endowed with the commitments, wishing to confer empowerment into the ma·πá·∏çala of the ten direction protectors, should construct the ma·πá·∏çala of the direction protectors in a pleasing place.

original: sa'i cho ga la sogs pa dbang bskur ba bzhin byas la /
analyzed: sa'i cho ga la sogs pa dbang bskur ba bzhin byas la /
translated: Having performed the earth ritual, and so on, as in the empowerment,

original: dbus su grub bzhi pa dmar por bya'o //
analyzed: dbus su grub bzhi pa dmar por bya'o //
translated: Having laid out the lines, in the center one should make a square with four sides that is red.

analyzed: de'i phyi rol du snam bu gru bzhi pa rin po che'i khang bcu bcu dang bcas pa bri'o //

analyzed: sgo ni rigs dang mthun par bris la bum pa bcu gcig rgyan rnams kyis brgyan la /

original: lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste /
analyzed: lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste /

analyzed: bcu po'i mgul bar dar sna tshogs pas sprel rma bya dang me long gis bri'o //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rnams su hom bcu brtsigs la bgegs rnams kyi ming byang dang bcas pa bya ste ci rigs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //

original: mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa dang / rab tu gtsang ma'i ba lim chen po bcu gcig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor la bzhag go //
analyzed: mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa dang / rab tu gtsang ma'i ba lim chen po bcu gcig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor la bzhag go //
translated: Arrange the various offerings that are available and eleven very clean large bali offerings around the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: gtor ma de dag re re la lha bshos dang mar me dang spos dang shog shog gi gdugs re dang / dar dmar po'i ba dan dang / rma bya'i rgyal mtshan dang / seng ge re gzugs so //

translated: For each of those bali offerings, there should be a cake, a lamp, incense, a parasol of palm leaves, a banner of red silk, a peacock victory banner, and a lion.

original: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag shul gyi snying po ji ltar rigs pas mtha' brten par bya ste /
analyzed: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag shul gyi snying po ji ltar rigs pas mtha' brten par bya ste /
translated: One should secure the borders with the appropriate essence mantras of pacifying, increasing, power, and wrath.

original: de nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la dbus su rdo rje @31a * //
analyzed: de nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la dbus su rdo rje @31a * //
translated: Then, having completed the rite of removing obstructors and so forth, in the center one should draw a vajra cross.üîΩ

analyzed: rnam 'joms sku mdog dmar por bsgyur la bya'o //
translated: Then, having completed the rite of removing obstructors, and so on, in the center, one should transform the Vajra-VighnƒÅntaka into red color.

analyzed: de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis sbyan drang ngo //

original: aom aa sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa sv'a h'a /
translated: O·πÉ a sva hƒÅ

analyzed: de dag gi mtha' yang dza dang h'um dang phat dang ste /
translated: At the end of those, there are ja, h≈´·πÉ, and pha·π≠.

original: sde bzhi zhi rgyas kyis dbye'o //
analyzed: sde bzhi zhi rgyas kyis dbye'o //
translated: The four clans are divided by pacifying and increasing.

original: de ltar so so'i bum pa'i nang du padma dang zla ba'i steng du brgya byin ser po lag na rdo rje thogs pa btsun mo dang lhan cig tu glang po cha zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: de ltar so so'i bum pa'i nang du padma dang zla ba'i steng du brgya byin ser po lag na rdo rje thogs pa btsun mo dang lhan cig tu glang po cha zhon pa bskyed do //
translated: In this way, in each vase, on a lotus and moon, one should generate yellow Indra holding a vajra, together with his queen, riding an elephant.

original: me lha ni drang srong gi cha lugs dang dbyu gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng dang blugs gzar thogs pa mdog dmar po ral zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: me lha ni drang srong gi cha lugs dang dbyu gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng dang blugs gzar thogs pa mdog dmar po ral zhon pa bskyed do //
translated: The fire god is generated as a sage with a rosary, a water pot, a staff, and a ladle, red in color, riding a ram.

original: gshin rje mdog nag po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pe con thogs pa ma he la zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: gshin rje mdog nag po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pe con thogs pa ma he la zhon pa bskyed do //
translated: Yama is generated as black in color, adorned with all ornaments, holding a club, riding a buffalo.

original: lho nub kyi bum par bden bral mdog dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: lho nub kyi bum par bden bral mdog dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: In the southwest vase, Nirriti is generated as red in color, with bared fangs,

original: lag na ral gri thogs pa mi la zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: lag na ral gri thogs pa mi la zhon pa bskyed do //

original: nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: In the west, Varuna is generated as white in color, adorned with all ornaments,

original: padma dang zhags pa thogs pa bum pa sngon po'i steng na 'dug pa bskyed do //
analyzed: padma dang zhags pa thogs pa bum pa sngon po'i steng na 'dug pa bskyed do //
translated: holding a lotus and a noose, standing on a blue pot.

original: nub byang du rlung lha mdog dud ka bsil yab thogs ba 'khor lo la zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: nub byang du rlung lha mdog dud ka bsil yab thogs ba 'khor lo la zhon pa bskyed do //
translated: In the northwest is the wind god, purple, holding a fan, and riding a wheel.

original: byang du ku be ra mdog sna tshogs pa dbyug to thogs ba rta la zhon pa bskyed do //
analyzed: byang du ku be ra mdog sna tshogs pa dbyug to thogs ba rta la zhon pa bskyed do //
translated: In the north is Kubera, multicolored, holding a club, and riding a horse.

original: byang shar du dbang ldan mdog dkar po la mgrin pa sngo ba glang mchog sngon po la zhon pa lag pa bzhi la sbrul se ral khar thogs pa gcig gis ral gri gcig na mdung rtse gsum pa /

translated: In the northeast is Ishvara, white with a blue neck, riding a blue bull, with four arms holding a snake, a sword, a trident, and a club.

original: g-yas yum dka' thub zlog ma la 'khyud pa lag pa gcig gis dam pa sbyin pa bskyed do //
analyzed: g-yas yum dka' thub zlog ma la 'khyud pa lag pa gcig gis dam pa sbyin pa bskyed do //

original: steng du zla ba ni mdog dkar po padma thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: steng du zla ba ni mdog dkar po padma thogs pa bskyed do //

original: dang pa la zhon pa mdun du bud med rnga ma'i bsil yab thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: dang pa la zhon pa mdun du bud med rnga ma'i bsil yab thogs pa bskyed do //

original: de nyid kyi bum par nyi ma mdog dmar bar bskyed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bum par nyi ma mdog dmar bar bskyed do //
translated: In his vase is the sun, red.

original: lag pa na padma thogs pa bskyed do //
analyzed: lag pa na padma thogs pa bskyed do //

original: yang dbang ldan gyi 'og ste 'og gi phyogs su sa'i lha mo lte ba man chad dmar mo yan chad gser las grub pa /
analyzed: yang dbang ldan gyi 'og ste 'og gi phyogs su sa'i lha mo lte ba man chad dmar mo yan chad gser las grub pa /
translated: Again, below the powerful one, that is, in the lower direction, generate the earth goddess, red below the navel and golden above,

original: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa lag na rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa thogs pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa lag na rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa thogs pa /

analyzed: sbrul la zhon pa bskyed do//

analyzed: @31b de ltar bskyed la aa las byung ba'i ye shes sems dpa' sbyan drangs te /

analyzed: so so'i snying po thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs pa de /

analyzed: ti li ti li bandha bandha sv'a h'a zhes bum pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /

original: mchod pa dang / phyogs skyong dang gtso bo la bstod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par byas la rol mo dang / sil snyan rnams kyis rab tu mnyes par bya zhing spos dang 'o ma la sogs pas mchod pa'am sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa dang / phyogs skyong dang gtso bo la bstod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par byas la rol mo dang / sil snyan rnams kyis rab tu mnyes par bya zhing spos dang 'o ma la sogs pas mchod pa'am sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: Make offerings, praise the direction protectors and principal deities, and so forth as appropriate. Delight them with music and cymbals, and make offerings or perform a burnt offering with incense, milk, and so forth.

original: de nas slob ma las thams cad pa'i bum pas khrus chu nas bton nas gos gsar pa gyon te mandal dbul ba la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: de nas slob ma las thams cad pa'i bum pas khrus chu nas bton nas gos gsar pa gyon te mandal dbul ba la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: Then, the disciples should be brought out of the water with the all-activity vase of the disciples. They should put on new clothes, offer a ma·πá·∏çala, and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / me tog gtor ba dang / gang la phog pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan cing /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / me tog gtor ba dang / gang la phog pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan cing /
translated: They should enter the ma·πá·∏çala, scatter flowers, and be shown the colors and implements of the deity on which they fall.

original: de nyid kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
analyzed: de nyid kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
translated: They should be made to repeat the essence mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, they should be empowered with various sounds.

original: dbang bskur ba bzhin du cho ga'i lhag ma ma lus par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba bzhin du cho ga'i lhag ma ma lus par bya'o //
translated: One should perform the remaining ritual as in the consecration.

original: de nas yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gtor ma'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gtor ma'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
translated: Then, having offered the libation, one should perform the extensive ritual of the sacrificial cakes.

original: de nas byin gyis brlab pa yang tshul bzhin du byas la gtor ma de dag la dar sna tshogs dang gdugs dang bcas pas snang gsal sbang ste ri mthon po'am nags tshal stug por bskyal lo //
analyzed: de nas byin gyis brlab pa yang tshul bzhin du byas la gtor ma de dag la dar sna tshogs dang gdugs dang bcas pas snang gsal sbang ste ri mthon po'am nags tshal stug por bskyal lo //
translated: Then, having also performed the consecration properly, one should carry the sacrificial cakes to a high mountain or a thick forest, together with various cloths and parasols, and light lamps.

original: dung la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sgrub pa po rnams kyang rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la /
analyzed: dung la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sgrub pa po rnams kyang rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la /
translated: Accompanied by various sounds of conches and so forth, and the practitioners adorned with various ornaments,

original: lag pa dang rkang pa'i gar dang ldan pas nyi ma rtse shar la bskyal /
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa'i gar dang ldan pas nyi ma rtse shar la bskyal /
translated: one should carry them at sunrise, with the dance of the hands and feet.

original: nang du log la bgegs mnan pa'i cho ga bya /
analyzed: nang du log la bgegs mnan pa'i cho ga bya /
translated: Having returned inside, one should perform the ritual of subduing obstacles.

original: de nas bkra shis gsol /
analyzed: de nas bkra shis gsol /
translated: Then, one should recite the benediction.

original: dkyil 'khor bsdu /üîΩbla ma la yon dbul lo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsdu / bla ma la yon dbul lo //
translated: One should dissolve the ma·πá·∏çala.üîΩOne should offer a gift to the guru.

original: bsod nams rdzogs pa'i don du ston mo bya /
analyzed: bsod nams rdzogs pa'i don du ston mo bya /
translated: For the sake of perfecting merit, one should hold a feast.

original: cho ga'i lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa bzlas /
analyzed: cho ga'i lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa bzlas /

original: lha rnams slob ma dang gnyis su med par bstim /
analyzed: lha rnams slob ma dang gnyis su med par bstim /
translated: The deities dissolve inseparably into the disciples.

original: snying padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: snying padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: They should reside in the heart, in an eight-petaled lotus.

original: slob mas bla ma la yon phul la dga' ba dang yi rang bar bya'o //
analyzed: slob mas bla ma la yon phul la dga' ba dang yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: The disciples should offer gifts to the guru and rejoice.

original: phyogs @32a * //
analyzed: phyogs @32a * //
translated: The ten directions

original: skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The ritual of conferring empowerment into the ma·πá·∏çala of the ten direction protectors composed by ≈örƒ´ Dƒ´pa·πÉkara is complete.
